bug.author: gustavla
bug.summary: Make sure wheels reflect macOS versions that are supported
bug.description: Right now wheels suggest that Turi Create supports macOS 10.5+, which will cause pip to try to install Turi Create on those versions. However, it only support 10.12+ and that should ideally be reflected in the wheels.

comments.comment: Closing. Looks like this hasn't been an issue since 4.2 (as of 4.3, we are specifying 10.12 as the minimum OS version in the package name).
